content: अभिहन् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To strike, smite, beat (<ab>fig.</ab> also); thump at; अभिहंति हंत कथमेष माधवं (स्मरः) <ls>Māl. 1. 39</ls>; लोष्टैरभिघ्नंतो नयत <ls>U. 4</ls>; कल्लोलमालाभिहतः पोतः <ls>Dk. 7.</ls> {@--2@} To hurt, injure, kill, destroy. {@--3@} To drive or beat off, ward off; आलोलपत्राभिहतद्विरेफं (अरविंदं) <ls>R. 6. 13.</ls> {@--4@} To strike or beat (as a drum &c.) <ls>Bg. 1. 13.</ls> {@--5@} To befall, attack; affect, overpower; <ls>Dk. 6.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To strike &c.
